item.title: This Financial Coach Is Ready to Fix Your Marriage Too
item.description: Ramit Sethi gets couples to open up for his shows, books, podcasts and a Netflix series

item.title: The WSJ Dollar Index Falls 0.5% to 101.80
item.description: The WSJ Dollar Index was down 0.5% to 101.80 — lower for two consecutive trading days.

item.title: You Can Own Elon Musk's SpaceX. But at What Price?
item.description: An ETF that can trade all day is investing in an asset that rarely changes hands. Figuring out what it’s worth is a guessing game.

item.title: Stock Investors Like Trump 2.0
item.description: Major indexes around the globe moved higher during President Trump’s first week in office.

item.description: Here are some of the major companies whose stocks moved on the week’s news.
